text: I k samudyanam - brata ikh Salikha. On skazal: "O narod moy! Poklonyaytes' Allakhu, net u vas nikakogo bozhestva, krome Nego! Prishlo k vam yasnoye svidetel'stvo ot vashego Gospoda: eto - verblyuditsa Allakha dlya vas znameniyem; ostav'te yeye pastis' na zemle Allakha, ne kasaytes' yeye so zlom, chtoby vas ne postiglo muchitel'noye nakazaniye
